Steps.Message: Update at 10:26 - Engineers have arrived on site in the Cross Street area. Using an average timescale for this type of issue, we're looking to have you back on between 11:30 and 12:30. Please follow the government pandemic guidelines about social distancing when interacting with our staff. For more information about this type of fault; here's a short YouTube video https://bit.ly/2y8Dtfz.

We became aware of a power cut at 08:51. We’re sorry for any disruption this may have caused you. We didn’t know in advance there would be a power cut but now that we know, our teams will do everything they can to get your power back quickly.
Steps.Name: Power cut reported

Steps.Message: We have engineers on their way. As this is affecting your area, they will not need to attend your property. Rest assured once they arrive, they’ll work as quickly as is safely possible to get your power back on.
Steps.Name: Engineers on their way

Steps.Message: Engineers are now on site, carrying out investigations into the fault. Once they have completed their assessment, they will carry out repairs.
Steps.Name: Engineers investigating and fixing

Logs.Comment: Update at 10:26 - Engineers have arrived on site in the Cross Street area. Using an average timescale for this type of issue, we're looking to have you back on between 11:30 and 12:30. Please follow the government pandemic guidelines about social distancing when interacting with our staff. For more information about this type of fault; here's a short YouTube video https://bit.ly/2y8Dtfz.

IncidentCategoryCustomerFriendlyDescript: A fault occurred on a piece of our electrical equipment which controls the power to your home.
